LanguageData.MakeTanningLiquorFromWood.label: 用原木制作鞣液
LanguageData.MakeTanningLiquorFromWood.description: 利用原木中的树皮和木材成分制作一批鞣液
LanguageData.MakeTanningLiquorFromWood.jobString: 正在将原木熬制成6份鞣液.
LanguageData.DankPyon_MakeTanningLiquorFromFood.label: 用食物制作鞣液
LanguageData.DankPyon_MakeTanningLiquorFromFood.descr: 用任何含有单宁的有机物制作一批鞣液.
LanguageData.DankPyon_MakeTanningLiquorFromFood.jobSt: 正在将食物加工成6份鞣液.
